name: mri_sclimbic_seg
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Segment subcortical limbic structures using Freesurfer.

inputs.description: T1-w image(s) to segment. Can be a path to a single image or a directory of images.
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Segmentation output (required if --i is provided). Must be the same type as the input path (a single file or directory).
inputs.name: Output file

inputs.description: Process a series of freesurfer recon-all subjects (enables subject-mode).
inputs.name: Subjects

inputs.description: Set the subjects directory (overrides the SUBJECTS_DIR env variable).
inputs.name: Subjects directory

inputs.description: Resample input to 1mm-iso; results will be put back in native resolution.
inputs.name: Conform flag

inputs.description: Include eTIV in volume stats (enabled by default in subject-mode and --tal).
inputs.name: eTIV flag

inputs.description: Alternative talairach xfm transform for estimating TIV. Can be file or suffix (for multiple inputs).
inputs.name: Talairach transformation

inputs.description: Save the label posteriors.
inputs.name: Write posteriors flag

inputs.description: Save label volume stats (enabled by default in subject-mode).
inputs.name: Write volumes flag

inputs.description: Save QA stats (z and confidence).
inputs.name: Write QA stats flag

inputs.description: List of label IDs to exclude in any output stats files.
inputs.name: Exclude labels

inputs.description: Explicitly keep anterior commissure in the volume/qa files.
inputs.name: Keep anterior commissure

inputs.description: Use discrete voxel count for label volumes.
inputs.name: Voxel count volumes

inputs.description: Alternative model weights to load.
inputs.name: Model weights file

inputs.description: Alternative color lookup table to embed in segmentation. Must be minimal, including 0, and sorted.
inputs.name: Color table file

inputs.description: Alternative population volume stats for QA output.
inputs.name: Population stats file

inputs.description: Enable debug logging.
inputs.name: Debug flag

inputs.description: Enable printing of vmpeak at the end.
inputs.name: VMP flag

inputs.description: Number of threads to use. Default is 1.
inputs.name: Threads

inputs.description: Preprocess 7T images (just sets percentile to 99.9).
inputs.name: Preprocess 7T

inputs.description: Use intensity percentile threshold for normalization.
inputs.name: Percentile

inputs.description: Cuda device for GPU support.
inputs.name: CUDA device

inputs.description: String to use in output file name; default is sclimbic.
inputs.name: Output base

inputs.description: Do not cite sclimbic paper at the end.
inputs.name: No cite flag

inputs.description: Number of channels
inputs.name: Number of channels
